t.t-value: placeholder_count and request.session.get('portal_counters', {}).get(placeholder_count) and not show_count

div.t-att-class: 'o_portal_index_card ' + ('' if force_show or config_card else 'd-none ') + ('col-12 order-0' if show_count else 'col-md-6 order-2')

a.t-attf-class: d-flex justify-content-start gap-2 gap-md-3 align-items-center py-3 pe-2 px-md-3 h-100 rounded text-decoration-none text-reset #{bg_color if bg_color else 'text-bg-light'}

h5.t-attf-class: mt-0 mb-1 #{'d-flex gap-2' if placeholder_count or count else ''}
